tool_description: The Football News Aggregator API is a powerful tool for football enthusiasts to stay updated with live and latest football news.
name: Football News Aggregator Live
title: Football News Aggregator Live

api_list.name: Get All Latest Football News From FourFourTwo Bundesliga
api_list.description: Get All Latest Football News From FourFourTwo (bundesliga)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-news-aggregator-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/fourfourtwo/bundesliga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-news-aggregator-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
